task.title: Operating the Spark Lever
task.shortdesc: Learn how to properly control the spark lever to optimize engine performance and fuel efficiency.

prereq.p: Familiarize yourself with the location of the spark lever before operating the vehicle.

context.p: The spark lever is located under the steering wheel on the left-hand side and plays a crucial role in engine performance and fuel economy.

step.cmd: Advance the spark lever to the maximum point the engine can tolerate.
Monitor the engine for knocking sounds.
step.stepresult: If a dull knock occurs, it indicates the spark is advanced too far, causing premature explosion.

step.cmd: Retard the spark lever only when the engine slows down on heavy roads or steep grades.

step.stepresult:
Over-retarding can cause:
Loss of engine power
Engine overheating
Potential valve damage (warped, burned, or cracked)

result.p: By mastering spark lever control, you can achieve maximum engine speed and optimal gasoline consumption.
